text: f'idha alnujum tumst wadhahab dyawha, wa'iidha alsama' tsddaet, wa'iidha aljibal ttayrt wtnathrt wasarat haba'an tadhrwh alryah, wa'iidha alrusul euyin lahum waqt wa'ajal llfsl baynahum wabayn alamm, yqal: lay yawm eazim akhkhirt alrsl? akhkhirt liawm alqada' walfsl bayn alkhlayq. wama aelmk -ayha al'insan- ay shay' hu yawm alfasl wshdth whwlh? hlak eazim fi dhalik alyawm lilmukadhibin bhdha alyawm almwewd
